thoughts.text: Based on the search results from the 'google' command, it looks like there are many different types of scavenger hunts. I think I can use the 'write_to_file' command to save a link to a scavenger hunt that looks interesting.
thoughts.reasoning: Saving a link to a scavenger hunt that looks interesting can help me remember to pursue the activity in the future. The 'write_to_file' command is a good way to save the link to a file.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'write_to_file' command to save a link to a scavenger hunt that looks interesting
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to spend too much time browsing the internet and instead focus on taking action and actually pursuing one of the activities.
thoughts.speak: Based on the search results from the 'google' command, it looks like there are many different types of scavenger hunts. I will use the 'write_to_file' command to save a link to a scavenger hunt that looks interesting. Which link would you like me to save?
